content: It's a holiday here in the US tomorrow (Veterans Day). See you Monday!
Thursday and Friday are a holiday in the US ( :turkey: Thanksgiving :turkey: ) and lots of us will be away tomorrow as well. See you Monday!
Monday is a holiday in the US. MLK day.
Monday is a holiday in the US: Presidents' Day. Also, school vacation week in Boston, at least, so some folks might be out.

Monday is Patriots' Day but it's only observed in six US states. Massachusetts is one of the BUT it's not a holiday for Harvard.

That said, a number of us are taking the day off (including me), so I'll see you Tuesday.

It's also Marathon Monday (always the same day as Patriots' Day) and the start of April vacation for kids. Have a good weekend! :woman_running: :man_running:

Philip Durbin said:

Monday is Patriots' Day but it's only observed in six US states. Massachusetts is one of the BUT it's not a holiday for Harvard.

That said, a number of us are taking the day off (including me), so I'll see you Tuesday.

It's also Marathon Monday (always the same day as Patriots' Day) and the start of April vacation for kids. Have a good weekend! :woman_running: :man_running:

Have a great and long weekend!

@Dimitri Szabo might appreciate this sign from the Boston Marathon yesterday:

pain.jpg
As @Sherry Lake reminded us in #community > Have a Great Memorial Day Weekend! (WHERE SHE POSTED A PIC OF HER NEW GRANDBABY), it's a holiday here in the US on Monday. See you Tuesday!
Tomorrow (Thursday) is a holiday across the US (Independence Day :flag_united_states: :fireworks: ) and Harvard employees (and many others, I'm sure), have Friday off as well.
Monday is a holiday here (Labor Day). Don't work too hard! :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
Monday is a holiday in the US. We won't be around :grinning:

Philip Durbin 🐉 said:

Monday is a holiday in the US. We won't be around :grinning:

Happy Columbus/Indigenous Peoples' Day
It's a holiday on Monday in the U.S. (Veterans Day). See you Tuesday! Have a good weekend!
It's Thanksgiving! :turkey: Harvard is closed Thursday and Friday and in addition to that, IQSS is closed tomorrow. See you in December! :snowflake:
Happy Thanksgiving :turkey:
Happy Holidays, everyone! :tada: We're shutting down at Dataverse headquarters until the new year. Officially, we're back on Thursday, January 2nd but some of us are taking extra time. Enjoy!
It's a holiday for Harvard on Monday (MLK Day). See you Tuesday! Have a good weekend!
It's a holiday in the US on Monday. Presidents' Day. :flag_united_states:
Harvard and all of the US, really, is closed on Monday. Memorial Day. See you Tuesday!
Tomorrow (Friday) is the US's 249th birthday! :birthday: :flag_united_states: We have the day off. :tada:
Just a heads up that Monday is a holiday in the US. Labor Day :flag_united_states:

Monday is a holiday in the US.

It's called Indigenous Peoples' Day here in Cambridge and Columbus Day elsewhere.
